Fs_management Struct Reference

#include <fat.h>

Detailed Description

Struture to save the variables frequently used by file system mounted.

Definition at line 257 of file fat.h.

Data Fields

U8 b_mode_nav
 Navigation mode ( FS_FILE or FS_DIR ).
Fs_rootdir rootdir
 address of root directory (FAT32 = start cluster) (FAT12&16 = (LSB16=address sector) and (MSB16 = nb entry size))
U16 u16_fat_size
 Size of one FAT (unit sector).
U16 u16_offset_data
 offset between the beginning of FAT and the first cluster
U16 u16_pos_sel_file
 position of file selected in the directory selected (only for navigation fonctions)
U32 u32_cluster_sel_dir
 number of first cluster of directory selected (0 for the root directory)
U32 u32_CountofCluster
 number of cluster managed by this FAT (include the two reserved cluster)
U32 u32_ptr_fat
 address of FAT
U8 u8_BPB_SecPerClus
 Size of cluster (unit sector).
U8 u8_lun
 number of logical driver
U8 u8_partition
 number of partition - 1 (0 or 1)
